snippet: The state of Michigan appears increasingly unlikely to follow through on threats to close up to 38 chronically low-performing schools in Detroit and seven other cities this summer....

headline.main: Texas Medical Board Orders Probation for Cancer Doctor
headline.print_headline: Texas Medical Board Orders Probation for Cancer Doctor

lead_paragraph: The state of Michigan appears increasingly unlikely to follow through on threats to close up to 38 chronically low-performing schools in Detroit and seven other cities this summer.
